title: The Week That Was: Raiders Return Home, Prepare For Divisional Battle With Denver Broncos (Oakland ...
text: ( Source : Oakland Raiders ) After falling on the road 22-20 to the Chicago Bears last weekend, the Oakland Raiders return home Sunday to take on the Denver Broncos at O.co Coliseum . Kickoff is scheduled for 1:25 p.m., but before the Raiders
